title: 126: BBQ Adventure: Heat and Meat in Gugulethu, Cape Town
itunes:title: 126: BBQ Adventure: Heat and Meat in Gugulethu, Cape Town
itunes:subtitle: We travel to Cape Town, South Africa, for insane barbecue; Melissa Clark rethinks how to cook at home; poet Nikki Giovanni remembers her grandparents' rack of lamb recipe; and Adam Gopnik unpacks his dream of the cast-iron pan.
description:
We travel to Cape Town, South Africa, for insane barbecue; Melissa Clark rethinks how to cook at home; poet Nikki Giovanni remembers her grandparents’ rack of lamb recipe; and Adam Gopnik unpacks his dream of the cast-iron pan. (Originally aired 5/27/17)

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
